      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                         java.io.File jarFile)
                  throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
        Description copied from interface: info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
        Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class full name should be same as full name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        jarFile - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

        Replaces the oldExtension} in the fileName with the newExtension.
